#pragma config(StandardModel, "EV3_REMBOT")
//*!!Code automatically generated by 'ROBOTC' configuration wizard               !!*//

//Robot moves in a square
//Left mnotor is half as strong at the right motor!!!!!!!!!

task main()
{
	//Move in a straight line forward for 2 seconds
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 50);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, 50);
	sleep(2000);
	
	//Turn 90 degrees to the right
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 13);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, -25);
	sleep(1000);
	
	//Move in a straight line forward for 2 seconds
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 50);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, 50);
	sleep(2000);
	
	//Turn 90 degrees to the right
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 13);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, -25);
	sleep(1000);
	
	//Move in a straight line forward for 2 seconds
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 50);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, 50);
	sleep(2000);
	
	//Turn 90 degrees to the right
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 13);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, -25);
	sleep(1000);
	
	//Move in a straight line forward for 2 seconds
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 50);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, 50);
	sleep(2000);
	
	//Turn 90 degrees to the right
	setMotorSpeed(leftMotor, 13);
	setMotorSpeed(rightMotor, -25);
	sleep(1000);

}
